code: var reducer=function reducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:[];var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;if(action.type==='addPost'){return state.concat(action.payload);}else if(action.type==='addLike'){var s=state;s.forEach(function(item){if(item.Id==action.payload){if(item.liked==0){item.liked=1;}else{item.liked=0;}return s;}});return s;}else if(action.type=='delPost'){var myState=[];state.forEach(function(item){if(item.postId!=action.payload){myState.push(item);}});return myState;}else if(action.type=='editPost'){state.forEach(function(item){if(item.postId==action.payload.postId){item.postTitle=action.payload.postTitle;item.postDesc=action.payload.postDesc;item.image=action.payload.image;}});return state;}else{return state;}};export default reducer;
